Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
May 6, 2020
NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:Lisa S. Kenna, of Vermont, a Career Member of the Senior Foreign Service, Class of Counselor, to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States of America to the Republic of Peru.
